title: Nogai - Luke (Print)
description: Nogai (Ногай тили, Nogay tili, Ногайша, Nogayşa) also known as Noğay, Noghay, Nogay, or Nogai Tatar, is a Turkic language spoken in Southeastern European Russia, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Ukraine, Bulgaria, Romania and in Turkey. It is the ancestral language of the Nogais. As a member of the Kipchak branch, it is closely related to Kazakh, Karakalpak, and Crimean Tatar (northern dialect).

language.name: Nogai
language.area: Northern Caucasus, Cherkes Ao. Also in Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan.
